alert.note: Alert for Adams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 6:31PM EST until February 23 at 3:19AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Ohio Brush Creek near West Union. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio Brush Creek near West Union. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of lowland areas continues. A few inches of water is over the creek side lanes of low-lying county roads near the creek close to Lawshee. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 16.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
